document_data.name: ''The Tale of Curran Strongheart''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Tale of Curran Strongheart''''' was a song that inspired courage in others.
document_data.Content: When the ballad was performed by a [[bard]], it became imbued with their magics. Those allies who heard the song became brave. This negated magical effects such as ''[[fear]]'' and fortified their courage in the face of even the most terrifying foes.
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1281}}, ''The Tale of Curran Strongheart'' was common among bards of meddling skills. It was heard being performed in the [[Ten-Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]] and the village of [[Kuldahar]].
